text: Va [ej pajomʙar, jod kun az] hangome ki Alloh taolo Iʙrohimro ʙo suxanon [-i farogir ʙar ahkomu takolifi şar'ī] ozmud va ū hamaro ʙa xuʙī ʙa ançom rasond. [Alloh taolo ʙa vaj] Farmud: "Man turo peşvoi mardum qaror mediham". [Iʙrohim] guft: "[Parvardigoro] Az farzandonam [niz peşvojone qaror ʙideh, to mardum ʙa onon iqtido kunand]".
